original_text: But the earth helped the woman by opening its mouth and swallowing the river that the dragon had spewed out of his mouth.
korean_text: 땅이 여자를 도와 그 입을 벌려 용의 입에서 토한 강물을 삼키니

sentences.original_text: But the earth helped the woman
that the dragon had spewed out of his mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 그 용이 자기의 입에서 토해낸 강이었다
